title: I can't find the IP chroma's
body: I seen them before but now they're not showing up for me were they limited time only..?

replies.body: thanks  for letting me know thanks! and what I get from the article is only select chroma's are available for purchase during these events?

The Chroma IP Sale was a limited sale that is planned to happen twice per year. During these sales, you can purchase a Chroma for 2000 IP. Check out our [Chroma Guide](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/skins/chromas) for additional details and please let me know if you have any questions.
Chromas IP sales are now for a limited [time](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/skins/chromas).
